author: Harry Craddock
description: Balanced, or even a tad on the sour side rather than sweet. Indeed, your choice of apricot liqueur will impact the need for added sugar. Adjust accordingly in the pursuit of deliciousness.
name: Webster Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
